nodes.bodyText: Q: Do we need to update the translations at the same time, since the "key" changed.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -12,7 +12,7 @@
     <div>
       <ul>
         <li class="button-group selfclear">
-          <button type="submit" wicket:id="submit"><wicket:message key="submit">submit</wicket:message></button>
+          <button type="submit" wicket:id="submit"><wicket:message key="save">save</wicket:message></button>

nodes.bodyText: The translations already contain translations for both "save" and for "submit" which are both already in use. So normally nothing should be changed?
nodes.diffHunk:
